meanings.definition: The prominent bone in the face below the eye, forming the prominence of the cheek.
meanings.sent1: She gently touched her cheekbone to feel the slight bump.
meanings.sent2: His cheekbone was bruised from the impact of the fall.
meanings.sent3: The cheekbone seemed to be the star of the face, always catching the light.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lifted her cheekbone like a crescent moon in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The boxer's cheekbone took the brunt of the punch, a testament to his toughness.
